Notes

Track C1 ("Last Night") contain samples from Deadato's "Nights In White Satin" ([url=http://www.discogs.com/Deodato-Deodato-2/master/84787]Deodato 2[/url]/1973) Track D3 ("Afternoon Love In") contain samples from Paul Horn's "Agra" ([url=http://www.discogs.com/Paul-Horn-Inside-The-Taj-Mahal/master/207030]Inside The Taj Mahal[/url]/1968) Some copies have sticker on the back cover with the tracklist and a different barcode printed on it.
